amendment.description: An amendment numbered 76 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section at the end Rule of Construction with Respect to Environmental Justice relating to communities of color and low-wealth communities which face the greatest harms due to climate change and greenhouse gas emissions.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add a new section at the end of the bill stating that nothing in this Act may be construed to controvert the fact that communities of color and low-wealth communities face the greatest harms due to climate change and greenhouse gas emissions.
